welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fort Wayne, where history and charm meet modern amenities. Explore our vibrant arts scene, delicious local cuisine, and beautiful parks as you make unforgettable memories in our city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.address: 1234 N Wells St (at 2nd St), Fort Wayne, IN 46808
